title: 14-year-old brother tricks 17-year-old sister with fake spider because she treats the bathroom like her private selfie studio, sparking chaos in the family: 'She spends 30 to 45 minutes taking selfies in the mirror with like 6 different outfits'
description: SIblings. What is there to say… we love 'em and we hate 'em. But they're ours to love and hate. It's like being born with a built-in best friend, greatest confidant, and still your greatest competitor and enemy. You're either laughing together over the most insane things that only the two of you would understand, or you're engaging in a cold war with both sides refusing to back down.When this younger 14-year-old brother got fed up with his 17-year-old sister for hogging the bathroom to use it as her private selfie studio, after her daily modeling sessions made him late for school several times, he decided to get even with her in a way that only a little brother can: unleashing a tiny plastic terror into the bathroom for her to discover.Unfortunately, the prank wasn't taken lightly, and her protests ended up getting their parents involved, who, rather than dealing with the issue, unequivocally decided to take the sister's side, parroting her audacicios claims of being "traumatized" and sending the younger teen running to this subreddit to see whether or not he was in the wrong for the conflict.
author: Brad Dickson
excerpt: 14-year-old brother tricks 17-year-old sister with fake spider because she treats the bathroom like her private selfie studio, sparking chaos in the family: 'She spends 30 to 45 minutes taking selfies in the mirror with like 6 different outfits' - The internet has generated a huge amount of laughs from cats and FAILS. And we all out of cats.
text: SIblings. What is there to say… we love 'em and we hate 'em. But they're ours to love and hate. It's like being born with a built-in best friend, greatest confidant, and still your greatest competitor and enemy. You're either laughing together over the most insane things that only the two of you would understand, or you're engaging in a cold war with both sides refusing to back down.When this younger 14-year-old brother got fed up with his 17-year-old sister for hogging the bathroom to use it as her private selfie studio, after her daily modeling sessions made him late for school several times, he decided to get even with her in a way that only a little brother can: unleashing a tiny plastic terror into the bathroom for her to discover.Unfortunately, the prank wasn't taken lightly, and her protests ended up getting their parents involved, who, rather than dealing with the issue, unequivocally decided to take the sister's side, parroting her audacicios claims of being "traumatized" and sending the younger teen running to this subreddit to see whether or not he was in the wrong for the conflict.
html:
SIblings. What is there to say… we love 'em and we hate 'em. But they're ours to love and hate. It's like being born with a built-in best friend, greatest confidant, and still your greatest competitor and enemy. You're either laughing together over the most insane things that only the two of you would understand, or you're engaging in a cold war with both sides refusing to back down.

When this younger 14-year-old brother got fed up with his 17-year-old sister for hogging the bathroom to use it as her private selfie studio, after her daily modeling sessions made him late for school several times, he decided to get even with her in a way that only a little brother can: unleashing a tiny plastic terror into the bathroom for her to discover.

Unfortunately, the prank wasn't taken lightly, and her protests ended up getting their parents involved, who, rather than dealing with the issue, unequivocally decided to take the sister's side, parroting her audacicios claims of being "traumatized" and sending the younger teen running to this subreddit to see whether or not he was in the wrong for the conflict.
